page.title: 19Animals/Fuel In Rhenigidale
page.content: {Animals}The main animal in this block is sheep. Everyone here keeps sheep. They also keep hens for eggs and there is 1 cow which provides most of the milk for the village. The dogs are all sheepdogs and there are a lot of pet cats. {Fuel}Each household cuts{peat}for their own use. They are cut by a group of people usually. One uses the{peat {iron}to cut blocks (8inx8inx3in) and another takes them and throws them out of the bog onto the area around to dry there. Once they have dried for a week or so they are{lifted.}This means that about six of them are stacked into small pyramids. Later they are { {gathered}into larger stacks and when they have completely dried they are put into bags or a{creel}and taken home. They are then stored in a shed or built into a{peat stack.}
